hi,

I have written a simple tutorial that describes 

1) how to write a custom jsp-taglibrary and
2) how to write JUnit and Cactus testcases for this.

I wrote it primarily for a few sessions that I have had
and will still have. It is rather elementary and is mainly
targeted for developers who have not used either but are
familiar with JSP-programming (and J2EE in general)

It contains a simple application that uses JDOM to parse
XML-files and stores the data using a custom taglibrary
to JSP-pages. I have myself run it under Tomcat 4.0 and 
WebLogic 6.1

Feel free to have a look. The tutorial can be found at 
http://kacoma.sourceforge.net/tutorial and the whole
package at http://sourceforge.net/projects/kacoma
